scripts.clean: shx rm -rf ../ui.apps/src/content/jcr_root/apps/core-components-examples/wcm-react/clientlibs/react-webcomponents/resources && shx rm -rf -rf coverage/ dist/ src/tsconfig.types.tsbuildinfo
scripts.build: npm run clean && react-scripts build && shx mv build ../ui.apps/src/content/jcr_root/apps/core-components-examples/wcm-react/clientlibs/react-webcomponents/resources
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && cross-env GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-scripts build && shx mv build ../ui.apps/src/content/jcr_root/apps/core-components-examples/wcm-react/clientlibs/react-webcomponents/resources
